name: Aatrox
description:
Phantom Blade
Active | Mana: 40/90
20% Shred the current target for 4 seconds and deal magic damage to them. Heal Health. Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

name: Ahri

Active | Mana: 0/60
Deal magic damage to the current target and magic damage to adjacent enemies. Fated Bonus: Gain 30 AP.

name: Alune
description:

Active | Mana: 0/60
Rain meteors through the row with the most total enemy Health. Meteors deal magic damage split between all enemies hit. Deal magic damage to the current target. name: Annie
description:
Get'em. Tibbers!
Active | Mana: 70/140
Passive: Heal Health when damaging a Burning enemy. Active: On first cast, hop on Tibbers, gaining max Health and Stunning enemies within 2 hexes for 1.5 seconds. Deal magic damage, Burn, and Wound enemies within 2 hexes for 8 seconds. Burn: Deal 1% of the target's max Health as true damage every second Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%.
Damage: 150% / 225% / 2500% AP Bonus Health AP: 300% / 350% / 1500% AP Bonus Health: 15% HP + Bonus Health AP Passive Heal = 5% HP
